item.title: Big-O Notation
item.description: Big-O is a framework for measuring the efficiency of an algorithm. Why bother? Big-O notation is used to describe the worst-case time complexity of an algorithm, so we can compare different algorithms and data structures and better predict their behavior as our input size increases. Types of Analysis To be able to analyze a given algorithm, we need to know which inputs take less time, and which take longer time.
